entries.journal_entry_description: Help Valance stop the Black Sun from sending tainted medicinal spice into the galaxy.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the Black Sun staging camp and scout the camp.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Find the Black Sun staging area.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Once you have killed 8 Black Sun Initiates, 5 Black Sun Smugglers, and 1 Black Sun Minion, return to Valance Serth.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Eliminate the Black Sun's space transport and return to Valance Serth
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Talk to Valance once the space transport is dead.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: C-3TC has caused his master too much trouble.  He needs a memory wipe.
